parameter.name: sourcePath
parameter.description: The path to the file to be copied.

parameter.name: targetPath
parameter.description: The target directory where to copy the file.

parameter.name: sourceFilePattern
parameter.description: The pattern (regex) of the files to be copied.

parameter.name: fileFilterType
parameter.description: Type of pattern matching: 'ant' for Ant-style patterns or 'regex' for regular expressions.

parameter.name: includeFiles
parameter.description: Comma-separated patterns for files to include.

parameter.name: excludeFiles
parameter.description: Comma-separated patterns for files to exclude.

parameter.name: maxFileAge
parameter.description: Maximum age of files to copy (e.g., '2h', '30m', '1d').

parameter.name: timeBetweenSizeCheck
parameter.description: Time in milliseconds to wait between size checks for file stability verification.

parameter.name: includeParent
parameter.description: Whether to copy including parent folder or only content inside

parameter.name: overwrite
parameter.description: Whether or not to overwrite the file if the target destination already exists.

parameter.name: renameTo
parameter.description: The new name for the copied file.

parameter.name: maxRetries
parameter.description: The maximum number of retry attempts in case of a failure.

parameter.name: retryDelay
parameter.description: The delay between retry attempts in milliseconds.

parameter.name: responseVariable
parameter.description: The name of the variable to which the output should be stored.

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.
